org.uribeacon.beacon

Class UriBeacon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.uribeacon.beacon.UriBeacon

  • public class UriBeacon
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Uri Beacon from Bluetooth LE scan.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] encodeUri(java.lang.String uri)
      Creates the Uri string with embedded expansion codes.
      int getFlags()
      Returns the Uri flags indicating the discoverable mode and capability of the device.
      int getTxPowerLevel()
      Returns the transmission power level of the packet in dBm.
      java.lang.String getUriString()
      Returns the Uri text of the packet.
      static UriBeacon parseFromBytes(byte[] scanRecordBytes)
      Parse scan record bytes to UriBeacon.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • parseFromBytes

        public static UriBeacon parseFromBytes(byte[] scanRecordBytes)
        Parse scan record bytes to UriBeacon.

        The format is defined in Uri Beacon Definition.

        Parameters:
        scanRecordBytes - The scan record of Bluetooth LE advertisement and/or scan response.

      • getFlags

        public int getFlags()
        Returns the Uri flags indicating the discoverable mode and capability of the device.

      • getTxPowerLevel

        public int getTxPowerLevel()
        Returns the transmission power level of the packet in dBm. This value can be used to calculate the path loss of a received packet using the following equation:

        pathloss = txPowerLevel - rssi

      • getUriString

        public java.lang.String getUriString()
        Returns the Uri text of the packet.

      • encodeUri

        public static byte[] encodeUri(java.lang.String uri)
        Creates the Uri string with embedded expansion codes.
        Parameters:
        uri - to be encoded
        Returns:
        the Uri string with expansion codes.
